app.name: Ultraviolet
app.one_liner: A set of primitives for manipulating terminal emulators with a focus on terminal user interfaces (TUIs).

core_loop: Ultraviolet provides tools and abstractions for handling user input and displaying dynamic, cell-based content in terminal applications using a modernized ncurses-inspired rendering model.

screens.name: Main Terminal Interface
screens.purpose: Display and interact with cell-based terminal content using the Cursed Render model.

rust_commands.name: query_terminal_bounds
rust_commands.purpose: Retrieve the available width and height of the terminal emulator.

mvp_plan: week 1: Capture keyboard and mouse events
acceptance_tests: Application correctly renders styled text in a grid-aligned terminal layout.
Terminal.Bounds() returns accurate available width and height after resize.
open_questions: How will API instability impact integration with Bubble Tea v2?
What fallback mechanisms exist for terminals without advanced capabilities?
